attributes.action: Borris Johnson to resign immediately for neglecting the health of our nation!
attributes.additional_details: Like other countries around the world, who have taken steps to Controll this pandemic, the world health organisation suggests we do the same. If borris refuses to put the health of the nation above the economy then we want a leader who will! As borris says "many more loved ones will die" and they certainly will without more stringent measures being put in place. We demand action, now, or resignation.
attributes.background: We demand borris Johnson either steps up and follows other countries by putting us on lockdown and prioritising the health of the nation. Or we want him to resign and allow a competent person to take over, one who follows the advice from the world health organisation.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign.

You may wish to sign this petition calling for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301397

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
